tldr: The `fxhash` crate is no longer maintained, as indicated by the developer. Its last commit documents that `fxhash` has served its purpose and will no longer receive updates.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `fxhash` package from your application. Please take a look at rustc-hash instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
